ValidationRule.description: A new opportunity cannot be set closed straight away.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Lost')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: New opportunities cannot be set to Status 'Closed Won' or 'Closed Lost'.
